message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $150. It's a great opportunity to experience its exceptional quality and value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me there?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to negotiate. For the product, I can offer it at $125. Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me there?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to offer the product at $115. This is my final offer. Please let me know if this works for you.
